Name: Blue Mountains City Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-5:30pm by appointment; closed public holidays and 1-2pm for lunch. General reference assistance available. General copying services available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: 1 day's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the Blue Mountains, NSW.

About.Major holdings: Katoomba Municipality: Rate and valuation records 1889-1934 (Microfiche). Blue Mountains Shire Council: Rate and valuation records 1907-1947 (Microfiche). Various: Newspapers 1882-1991 (Microfilm 6.3m); Photographs 1870s- (10m).
